Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I might ask the <clr:0000>monster-control crew<clr:ffff>
if they can deal with the pirates in
my village.
Com_Talk_02:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:ffff>Pleasure doing business!<sp:5:0:0> Anything else
you want to sell?
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>So you're Link, huh? Some of the soldiers
were just telling me.

As a simple man from <clr:0000>Lurelin<clr:ffff>, I'm a
little starstruck. We don't see a lot of
celebrities back home!
Com_Talk_05c: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Whatever you want to sell, I'll buy!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Need to buy anything?


You should talk to my wife! She's the
<clr:0000>Lurelin <clr:ffff>cutie who runs the shop upstairs.
Talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come in! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>Only the freshest fish here! Outta the
water and into your pouch!
Free_Talk_56_a:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0101><clr:ffff>I'll remind you they're free...<sp:5:0:0> Are you sure
you only want one?
Com_Talk_05d: <sp:3:0:2:0101>Take your time selecting. I'm in no hurry.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>No matter where you go, Goddess Statues
look the same. I find that comforting.
Talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come in! Welcome! Want some fish?
Caught just this morning—<sp:5:0:0>still flappin'
their flippers!
Free_Talk_56_b: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>Aha. So you want to take the last one?
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>As a simple man from <clr:0000>Lurelin<clr:ffff>, I'm a
little starstruck. We don't see a lot of
celebrities back home!
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Say, did you see those books they have
here? I tried reading one the other day.

Complete gibberish. How can the <clr:0000>Zonai
Survey Team <clr:ffff>make sense of that stuff?
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come in! Welcome! Look at these fish!
Caught just this morning—<sp:5:0:0>still flappin'
their flippers!
Whaddaya say? Might make a nice snack!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>There was no one in my village quite
like Kosi, I'll tell you that.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hi, sir! Welcome! This shop belongs to my
beautiful wife, Mubs!
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come in! Welcome! Look at these fish!
Caught just this morning—<sp:5:0:0>still flappin'
their flippers!
Whaddaya say? Little late-night snack?
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're saying the pirates are gone and
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> is safe? That's great!<sp:0:4:0>I'm looking forward to the day everything
there is rebuilt so we can all return home.

Then I'll reopen my <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff>!


<sp:3:0:2:0800>And you'll be my first customer!
Won't you?
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hi, sir! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>This shop belongs to Mubs, my wife,
whose smile brightens rainy days!
Talk_1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Come in! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>Rain or shine, we'll always have the
freshest fish around! That's what you
can expect from professionals!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Beds! You believe that? In my village,
you couldn't find these anywhere but
at the <clr:0000>inn<clr:ffff>.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Once we've rebuilt Lurelin Village and life
gets back to normal, we'll reopen the
store there!
In the meantime, we'll knuckle down here
and save our rupees.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We used to have a store in Lurelin Village,
but we haven't been back since those
pirates showed up.
But why dwell on that? We're making
do here!
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm dreaming of the day when we rebuild
Lurelin Village and reopen our store.

Until then, I'm trying to save some money.
Talk_1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>How about that! You cleared us out!<sp:0:4:0>I'm just happy to keep you fed. I'm sure
my wife at Lookout Landing would agree.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>How about that hidden passageway?
Neat, huh? I'll have to look for one of
those in my village, if I ever get back.
Talk_25:
Well, I'm glad to hear everyone in the
village is safe.

Now if we could just run those pirates out
of town...

<sp:3:0:2:0800>Mark my words—one day, we will, and the
village will go back to how it was.

And when that day comes, I'll reopen <clr:0000>the
Lurelin Village store<clr:ffff>!

You'll stop by, of course.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>We'll make do here until those pirates
have left Lurelin Village for good.
Talk_0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There's nothing like the feeling you get
when you've sold all you can sell. But I'll
restock, so don't stay away too long!
Talk_0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Glad you know what you like! Shop
here anytime!
Com_Talk_02b:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks! Anything else to offload?
I'm happy to buy it!
Talk_0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll catch some fresh stock for next time,
so come see me again!
Com_Talk_02c: <sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank youuu! Got anything else for me?
Talk_0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>There just isn't enough merchandise in
the world sometimes. But I'll get more in
stock, so come back and see me later!
Com_Talk_02d:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm happy with that! Is there anything else
you don't want?
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Uh...<sp:5:0:0> I can't buy that off you. Sorry.
Talk_9002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>We need that for the business! Please,
leave it alone!
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome, welcome! Want some fish?
Caught just this morning—<sp:5:0:0>still flappin'
their flippers!
Without your help, Link, we could never
have opened the shop back up.<sp:0:4:0>So load up, OK? You earned it!
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't buy clothes with you in them.<sp:5:0:0>
Take that off and we'll talk.
Talk_9003:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Like I said, without that, we can't keep
the business going. I appreciate all you've
done for us, but please leave it alone.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I feel like such a fish out of water here.
There's a whole lot of world outside my
little village!
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hi, sir! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>This shop belongs to Mubs, my wife,
who's as beautiful as a sunrise!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Lurelin Village! It's a fishing town in
<clr:0000>East Necluda<clr:ffff>, faaar to the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>.

Used to be a popular resort, thanks to its
sandy white beaches and gorgeous views
of the sparkling sea.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Then we got attacked by <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>. Now,
no one's living there, let alone running
the shops...<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But listen to me getting all gloomy!
There is an upside. If not for the pirates,
my wife and I wouldn't have come here.
I should just shut my trap and enjoy the
charms of <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>!
Com_Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Changed your mind? Well, come back if
you change it again.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I really am grateful they took us in and let
us run our business here!
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hi, sir! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>This shop belongs to Mubs, my wife,
who's more dazzling than the sun!
Talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Of course, we <clr:0000>won't take money <clr:ffff>from the
generous soul who rebuilt our village.<sp:0:4:0>Help yourself to anything in the store!
Clean us out, if you like!
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Ack! Your pouch is too full. Organize the
stuff in there and we'll talk, OK?
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hi, sir! Welcome!<sp:0:4:0>This shop belongs to Mubs, my wife,
who shines like the moon!
Talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome, welcome! Hungry for fish?
Caught just this morning—<sp:5:0:0>still flappin'
their flippers!
Oh, it's you! I've got to thank you, Link.
You really brought the Lurelin spirit back
to this community.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Of course, we <clr:0000>won't take money<clr:ffff> from the
generous soul who rebuilt our village.<sp:0:4:0>Help yourself to anything and everything
in the store!
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>For the village's savior, no charge!
<clr:0000>All our products are free!<clr:ffff>
